member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.WindowExtensions.IsCurrentVirtualDesktop(System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: Determines whether the window is located over the virtual desktop that current displayed.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.WindowExtensions.GetCurrentDesktop(System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: Returns a virtual desktop that window is located.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.WindowExtensions.MoveToDesktop(System.Windows.Window,WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop)
member.summary: Move this window to specified virtual desktop.
